summary: Comprehensive testing of Pricing Groups feature - Iteration 3. All new features tested: Pricing Groups CRUD, User Assignment/Removal via Add/Remove buttons, Manage Users modal with two panels, Navigation link. Backend: 32/32 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All UI flows working correctly.
passed_tests: Pricing Groups page loads correctly with navigation link visible
GET /api/pricing-groups - returns list of groups with user counts
GET /api/pricing-groups/{id} - returns single group
POST /api/pricing-groups - creates new group with custom connector pricing
PATCH /api/pricing-groups/{id} - updates group name, description, and connector prices
DELETE /api/pricing-groups/{id} - deletes group (only if no users assigned)
GET /api/pricing-groups/{id}/users - returns users in group
POST /api/pricing-groups/{id}/users/{user_id} - assigns user to group
DELETE /api/pricing-groups/{id}/users/{user_id} - removes user from group
Duplicate group name rejection (400 error)
Cannot delete group with assigned users (400 error)
Authentication required for pricing groups endpoints
Admin role required for CRUD operations
Create Group modal - opens with form fields for name, description, connector pricing
Edit Group modal - pre-fills existing values, updates on save
Delete Group - confirmation dialog, removes group from list
Manage Users modal - two panels (In Group, Available)
Add button - moves user from Available to In Group
Remove button - moves user from In Group to Available
User count updates correctly on group cards
Search functionality in Manage Users modal
Drag handle visible on user cards (DnD support)
Excel import case-insensitive column handling verified in code
seed_data_creation: Test pricing groups created and cleaned up during testing. Existing 'Premium Users' group preserved with 1 user assigned.

mocked_apis.PayU: PayU payment gateway is in sandbox mode
mocked_apis.OCPP: OCPP 1.6 WebSocket protocol is SIMULATED via REST endpoints

context_for_next_testing_agent: Pricing Groups feature fully implemented and tested. CRUD operations work correctly. User assignment via Add/Remove buttons works. Manage Users modal has two panels with drag-and-drop support using @dnd-kit library. Group pricing takes precedence over default pricing in get_pricing function. Excel import handles 'Start Time' column case-insensitively. Currency is Colombian Pesos (COP).
